content:
During the conduct of intelligence in the Zaporizhzhya direction, operators of the 3rd separate Regiment of the SCO found an automatic obstacle station P-330G "resident".

This is stated in the message of the forces of special operations.

On the enemy target, operators fired a rocket-artillery unit of defense forces.

As a result of coordinated work, the complex of "resident" was destroyed.

As reported by the Armyinform, the military of the Russian Federation is activeUsedSouthern reconnaissance drones, trying to compensate for the absence of aircraft of distant radar reconnaissance A-50.
title: In the Zaporozhye direction, special forces destroyed the enemy complex of the Reb
description: This is stated in the message of the forces of special operations. On the enemy target operators ...
author: Army Inform
